00094 void BLO_blendhandle_print_sizes(BlendHandle *bh, void *fp) 
00095 {
00096     FileData *fd= (FileData*) bh;
00097     BHead *bhead;
00098 
00099     fprintf(fp, "[\n");
00100     for (bhead= blo_firstbhead(fd); bhead; bhead= blo_nextbhead(fd, bhead)) {
00101         if (bhead->code==ENDB)
00102             break;
00103         else {
00104             short *sp= fd->filesdna->structs[bhead->SDNAnr];
00105             char *name= fd->filesdna->types[ sp[0] ];
00106             char buf[4];
00107             
00108             buf[0]= (bhead->code>>24)&0xFF;
00109             buf[1]= (bhead->code>>16)&0xFF;
00110             buf[2]= (bhead->code>>8)&0xFF;
00111             buf[3]= (bhead->code>>0)&0xFF;
00112             
00113             buf[0]= buf[0]?buf[0]:' ';
00114             buf[1]= buf[1]?buf[1]:' ';
00115             buf[2]= buf[2]?buf[2]:' ';
00116             buf[3]= buf[3]?buf[3]:' ';
00117             
00118             fprintf(fp, "['%.4s', '%s', %d, %ld ],\n", buf, name, bhead->nr, (long int)(bhead->len+sizeof(BHead)));
00119         }
00120     }
00121     fprintf(fp, "]\n");
00122 }

00124 LinkNode *BLO_blendhandle_get_datablock_names(BlendHandle *bh, int ofblocktype, int *tot_names)
00125 {
00126     FileData *fd= (FileData*) bh;
00127     LinkNode *names= NULL;
00128     BHead *bhead;
00129     int tot= 0;
00130 
00131     for (bhead= blo_firstbhead(fd); bhead; bhead= blo_nextbhead(fd, bhead)) {
00132         if (bhead->code==ofblocktype) {
00133             char *idname= bhead_id_name(fd, bhead);
00134 
00135             BLI_linklist_prepend(&names, strdup(idname+2));
00136             tot++;
00137         }
00138         else if (bhead->code==ENDB)
00139             break;
00140     }
00141 
00142     *tot_names= tot;
00143     return names;
00144 }
00145 
00146 LinkNode *BLO_blendhandle_get_previews(BlendHandle *bh, int ofblocktype, int *tot_prev)
00147 {
00148     FileData *fd= (FileData*) bh;
00149     LinkNode *previews= NULL;
00150     BHead *bhead;
00151     int looking=0;
00152     PreviewImage* prv = NULL;
00153     PreviewImage* new_prv = NULL;
00154     int tot= 0;
00155     
00156     for (bhead= blo_firstbhead(fd); bhead; bhead= blo_nextbhead(fd, bhead)) {
00157         if (bhead->code==ofblocktype) {
00158             char *idname= bhead_id_name(fd, bhead);
00159             switch(GS(idname))
00160             {
00161                 case ID_MA: /* fall through */
00162                 case ID_TE: /* fall through */
00163                 case ID_IM: /* fall through */
00164                 case ID_WO: /* fall through */
00165                 case ID_LA: /* fall through */
00166                     new_prv = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PreviewImage), "newpreview");
00167                     BLI_linklist_prepend(&previews, new_prv);
00168                     tot++;
00169                     looking = 1;
00170                     break;
00171                 default:
00172                     break;
00173             }
00174         }
00175         else if (bhead->code==DATA) {
00176             if (looking) {
00177                 if (bhead->SDNAnr == DNA_struct_find_nr(fd->filesdna, "PreviewImage") ) {
00178                     prv = BLO_library_read_struct(fd, bhead, "PreviewImage");   
00179                     if (prv) {
00180                         memcpy(new_prv, prv, sizeof(PreviewImage));
00181                         if (prv->rect[0]) {
00182                             unsigned int *rect = NULL;
00183                             new_prv->rect[0] = MEM_callocN(new_prv->w[0]*new_prv->h[0]*sizeof(unsigned int), "prvrect");
00184                             bhead= blo_nextbhead(fd, bhead);
00185                             rect = (unsigned int*)(bhead+1);
00186                             memcpy(new_prv->rect[0], rect, bhead->len);                 
00187                         }
00188                         else {
00189                             new_prv->rect[0] = NULL;
00190                         }
00191                         
00192                         if (prv->rect[1]) {
00193                             unsigned int *rect = NULL;
00194                             new_prv->rect[1] = MEM_callocN(new_prv->w[1]*new_prv->h[1]*sizeof(unsigned int), "prvrect");
00195                             bhead= blo_nextbhead(fd, bhead);
00196                             rect = (unsigned int*)(bhead+1);
00197                             memcpy(new_prv->rect[1], rect, bhead->len);                         
00198                         }
00199                         else {
00200                             new_prv->rect[1] = NULL;
00201                         }
00202                         MEM_freeN(prv);
00203                     }
00204                 }
00205             }
00206         }
00207         else if (bhead->code==ENDB) {
00208             break;
00209         }
00210         else {
00211             looking = 0;
00212             new_prv = NULL;
00213             prv = NULL;
00214         }
00215         
00216     }
00217 
00218     *tot_prev= tot;
00219     return previews;
00220 }

00222 LinkNode *BLO_blendhandle_get_linkable_groups(BlendHandle *bh) 
00223 {
00224     FileData *fd= (FileData*) bh;
00225     GHash *gathered= BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "linkable_groups gh");
00226     LinkNode *names= NULL;
00227     BHead *bhead;
00228     
00229     for (bhead= blo_firstbhead(fd); bhead; bhead= blo_nextbhead(fd, bhead)) {
00230         if (bhead->code==ENDB) {
00231             break;
00232         }
00233         else if (BKE_idcode_is_valid(bhead->code)) {
00234             if (BKE_idcode_is_linkable(bhead->code)) {
00235                 const char *str= BKE_idcode_to_name(bhead->code);
00236                 
00237                 if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(gathered, (void *)str)) {
00238                     BLI_linklist_prepend(&names, strdup(str));
00239                     BLI_ghash_insert(gathered, (void *)str, NULL);
00240                 }
00241             }
00242         }
00243     }
00244     
00245     BLI_ghash_free(gathered, NULL, NULL);
00246     
00247     return names;
00248 }

00250 void BLO_blendhandle_close(BlendHandle *bh)
00251 {
00252     FileData *fd= (FileData*) bh;
00253     
00254     blo_freefiledata(fd);
00255 }

00259 BlendFileData *BLO_read_from_file(const char *filepath, ReportList *reports)
00260 {
00261     BlendFileData *bfd = NULL;
00262     FileData *fd;
00263         
00264     fd = blo_openblenderfile(filepath, reports);
00265     if (fd) {
00266         fd->reports= reports;
00267         bfd= blo_read_file_internal(fd, filepath);
00268         blo_freefiledata(fd);           
00269     }
00270 
00271     return bfd; 
00272 }

00274 BlendFileData *BLO_read_from_memory(void *mem, int memsize, ReportList *reports)
00275 {
00276     BlendFileData *bfd = NULL;
00277     FileData *fd;
00278         
00279     fd = blo_openblendermemory(mem, memsize,  reports);
00280     if (fd) {
00281         fd->reports= reports;
00282         bfd= blo_read_file_internal(fd, "");
00283         blo_freefiledata(fd);           
00284     }
00285 
00286     return bfd; 
00287 }

00289 BlendFileData *BLO_read_from_memfile(Main *oldmain, const char *filename, MemFile *memfile, ReportList *reports)
00290 {
00291     BlendFileData *bfd = NULL;
00292     FileData *fd;
00293     ListBase mainlist;
00294     
00295     fd = blo_openblendermemfile(memfile, reports);
00296     if (fd) {
00297         fd->reports= reports;
00298         BLI_strncpy(fd->relabase, filename, sizeof(fd->relabase));
00299         
00300         /* clear ob->proxy_from pointers in old main */
00301         blo_clear_proxy_pointers_from_lib(oldmain);
00302 
00303         /* separate libraries from old main */
00304         blo_split_main(&mainlist, oldmain);
00305         /* add the library pointers in oldmap lookup */
00306         blo_add_library_pointer_map(&mainlist, fd);
00307         
00308         /* makes lookup of existing images in old main */
00309         blo_make_image_pointer_map(fd, oldmain);
00310         
00311         /* makes lookup of existing video clips in old main */
00312         blo_make_movieclip_pointer_map(fd, oldmain);
00313         
00314         bfd= blo_read_file_internal(fd, filename);
00315         
00316         /* ensures relinked images are not freed */
00317         blo_end_image_pointer_map(fd, oldmain);
00318         
00319         /* ensures relinked movie clips are not freed */
00320         blo_end_movieclip_pointer_map(fd, oldmain);
00321         
00322         /* move libraries from old main to new main */
00323         if (bfd && mainlist.first!=mainlist.last) {
00324             
00325             /* Library structs themselves */
00326             bfd->main->library= oldmain->library;
00327             oldmain->library.first= oldmain->library.last= NULL;
00328             
00329             /* add the Library mainlist to the new main */
00330             BLI_remlink(&mainlist, oldmain);
00331             BLI_addhead(&mainlist, bfd->main);
00332         }
00333         blo_join_main(&mainlist);
00334         
00335         blo_freefiledata(fd);           
00336     }
00337 
00338     return bfd; 
00339 }
00340 
00341 void BLO_blendfiledata_free(BlendFileData *bfd)
00342 {
00343     if (bfd->main) {
00344         free_main(bfd->main);
00345     }
00346     
00347     if (bfd->user) {
00348         MEM_freeN(bfd->user);
00349     }
00350 
00351     MEM_freeN(bfd);
00352 }
